name: Torn Familjen
description: A stylised JRPG-style game, in which you guide Cathrin, a budding mage, through a range of environments, taking on big bosses and uncovering the secrets of the magical world of Taika.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 717 MB available space
